          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Metals and Non-metals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Metalle und Nichtmetalle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Métaux et non-métaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Metais e não-metais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Metalli e metalloidi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέταλλα και αμέταλλα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Metales y no metales</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows which elements are classified as metals and which are non-metals in the periodic table of elements.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">calcium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">helium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lithium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnesium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">non-metal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, welche Elemente als 
Metalle eingestuft werden und welche Nichtmetalle in der periodischen 
Tabelle der Elemente sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre quels éléments sont 
classifiés comme métaux et ce qui sont des non-métaux dans la table
périodique des éléments.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que elementos são 
classificados como metais e quais são não-metais na tabela 
periódica dos elementos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra quali elementi sono 
classificati come metalli e quale sono metalloidi nella tabella 
periodica degli elementi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ποια στοιχεία είναι 
ταξινομημένα ως μέταλλα και όποια είναι αμέταλλα στον περιοδικό 
πίνακα των στοιχείων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra qué elementos se 
clasifican como metales y cuáles son no metales en el vector 
periódico de elementos.</string>
          </description>
